posts.post_content:
Posted in main forum.

Thanks Leftygrove10!

Welcome to the forum!  You have posted this in the B/S/T section of the forum.  More people will see this post and respond if you post this in the main forum (click on "Net54 Forum Homepage" on the top, left side of the page).

Since you posted this on the main forum, you might want to delete the text of your original post above and indicate that it has been moved to the main forum.  Doing so will ensure that all of the responses to your post are in one place (on the main forum).
